entry.title: First article so will started with ‘Hello world’

link.title: First article so will started with 'Hello world'

entry.content:
I am Prashant Srivastav as blog url says.

I'm working as Software engineer at Koove.

I’m passionate about working in Information technology and Research. I love to do research about new ideas and find new ways to implement them in different ways

Worked in Technology

i started printing "Hello World" in C using printf while learning and exploring c in my college days because this is first and simple program which is given in book or first example given by teacher. But printing "Hello World" used as a greeting or to begin a program in computer language.

i've worked in various technologies and language. when i started coding while graduation my favourite language was .NET then i started exploring Java and PHP to develop and Java Script and Angularjs to design. now i'm exploring android with rxjava to improve and manage code

I love to work in linux/unix environment. As techOps i have worked and used physical servers for hosting, managing and monitoing of application and servers.

Interesting thing is while writing this blog i've started exploring Ruby and jekyll.

when you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. your tastes only narrow & exclude people. so create.

This is "Hello World" to start, somtimes writing "Hello World" also becomes difficult.
entry.summary: I am Prashant Srivastav as blog url says.
